name: Deven Julian Borders
title: Crowned Heir
notes: Firstborn heir of Omega. Preparing for crowning at age 17. Author of Scroll 031.

name: Demarco C. Borders
title: Heir Apparent
notes: Younger brother of Deven. Future scroll to be authored. Witness to Scroll 031.

name: Devenity Marie Borders
title: Princess
notes: Daughter of Omega and Miranda M. Eden. To be trained in the Harmonies of Sovereignty and prepared for future scroll authorship and ceremonial crowning.
